fraction_explorer.intro:
🧩 Fraction Explorer — Split the Square!
We'll cut shapes, name fractions, and build a whole. Ready? ✂️🟧

ex1_split_whole.prompt_split: Tap the square to split it in half! ✂️
ex1_split_whole.hint: Two equal pieces = halves. One piece is 1/2.
ex1_split_whole.success: Nice! You made two halves — each is 1/2. 🎉
ex1_split_whole.incorrect: Hmm… that doesn't match the split. Look — there are only 2 equal parts.

ex2_split_one_half.prompt_split_top: Tap the top half to split it again! ✂️
ex2_split_one_half.hint_top_piece: You split a half into 2 equal parts → each is 1/4.
ex2_split_one_half.incorrect_top_piece: Almost! Count how many equal pieces the whole shape has.
ex2_split_one_half.sum_incorrect: Not quite. Add the two top pieces together.

ex3_split_another_side.prompt_split_other: Tap the right side to split it too! ✂️
ex3_split_another_side.incorrect: Think of how many quarters fit into one whole.

ex4_build_from_parts.prompt: Combine the pieces to make a whole.
ex4_build_from_parts.hint: ¼ + ¼ + ½ = 1 whole. Fill the whole square. 🟧
ex4_build_from_parts.incorrect: Close! Check if all the space is covered with no gaps.

ex5_predict_before.prompt_predict_fraction: Before we split, predict: What will each piece be? 🤔
ex5_predict_before.hint_prediction: The more pieces we cut, the smaller each piece gets.
ex5_predict_before.incorrect_prediction: Not quite — look at the total number of equal pieces.
ex5_predict_before.prompt_predict_pieces: How many pieces do you want to make?
ex5_predict_before.success_split: Nice prediction! Those pieces match your choice. ✅
ex5_predict_before.incorrect_split: Hmm… count the equal parts and match that to the fraction.
ex5_predict_before.wrap_up:
🎉 You Built a Whole!
¼ + ¼ + ½ = 1 whole — amazing work! 🌟
